website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 510 v4 trail shoe was appreciated because of its comfortable construction. Neutral runners liked how the shoe fit and how the materials meshed together to deliver a pleasant in-shoe environment. The low price was also a positive element, as well. Contrariwise, some people had complaints, such as a not-too-appealing design, the inconsistent sizing scheme, and the questionable quality of the materials.
pros: Many people liked the affordable price of the New Balance 510 v4
Some consumers noted that this running shoe functioned well as a general-purpose option
Several testers claimed that the durability of the components proved to be reliable
The underfoot platform had a firmness that worked well on the trails, several runners commented
The width profiles were deemed as adherent to expectations
According to some consumers, the upper unit was able to hug the foot securely and comfortably
The grip capacity of the outsole was lauded by those who have tested this shoe
cons: Some consumers lamented that this running shoe wasn’t very fashionable
A handful of consumers claimed that the cushioning system wasn’t responsive
they didn’t feel any bounce when taking a step
Some people complained that the materials looked cheap and flimsy
A tester reported that after only a few months, the internal lining tore apart while the tread on the sole unit wore off

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled product
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as women’s trail running shoe but I received a men’s running shoe. I have screen shots of the same item listed as both women’s and men’s. Confusing and disappointing — I hope they fix the issue soon!
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Roddey

customer_reviews.title: I have the same shoe in the same size but for some reason these are a lot smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused on if this is a man or woman shoe. When I go to my orders it has it as a man’s shoe. However, when I go to write a review I am writing it for a woman’s shoe. That could be why these are so much smaller than my regular size 10’s. I also purchased wide and I did not get wide. The shoes are fine other than the sizing being off. I’m not sure if maybe I got a woman’s shoe instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Tight Initially, but Gets Quite Comfy
customer_reviews.text: First impression: Looks great, more like a standard running shoe. Foot slips in, a little tight around the sides of the toe box (balls of the feet) but otherwise comfortable. Very light compared to the Walmart trail shoes I've been using. On the trail: The shoe loosens up and the toe box becomes more comfortable. Went up 800 feet in half a mile in damp sand without a problem. I don't feel any moisture coming through from the mud. Great grip. A lot less knee pain compared to the Walmart shoes I just got rid of. For as cheap as these shoes are, I'm very pleased. I couldn't ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, very comfortable. Nice styling, they look good w/ jeans and great with workout pants. But a little too bulky for the weight room. These are large shoes, not relative to size#. Nice color. Very, very sturdy/supportive. I have flat feet. Great for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoes I've put on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned at least 10 pairs of new balance and never have I had a pair like these. First they rubbed my toes, I have worn them for about 60k steps because I walk a lot for work. My feet have never hurt so bad. I'm going to keep them as a spare since I have already broke them in, but I had to replace with other shoes... I probably will steer away from new balance in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Vulgar Kyle

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the liner
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits fine for the size ordered 9.5 4E. The only negative is the inside liner is paper thin nothing like my old pair. I do not know if this is something the seller did or if it is a new balance thing. I will go try shoes on at the local store here in a couple weeks and try to update. I took my old liner out and put in the new shoes and they are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoe must be sized wrong. They seem to run smaller than indicate. Had previous version of this model and loved it but this is nothing like its predecessor. It is uncomfortable and bruised terribly due to the wrong sizing. I can not recommend this shoe for hiking. The padding was skimpy and would give you blisters after just 2 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: What's up with NB sizing?
customer_reviews.text: 13D. That's been my NB size in trail runners for over a decade. Sadly, this shoe, a 13D, is way too short and the 14 is way way too long even with the heavy Smart Wool socks I wear. The same thing happened with the 410 model I bought a week ago. Those of us with big feet know that half sizes stop with size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Pine

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I use these for running and part of the time I run on real trails and most of the time on asphalt trails so I appreciate the support and the added toe protector. Fits well and I like how you can lock your foot in position with shoe laces setup. I also use them as golf shoes. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M&T

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: returning them. i am not impressed by how they feel. i bought another brand of shoes and these arrived at the same time. and the other shoes were a world of difference. it was like why ever wear these NB shoes; the difference was too great. these are like eating cardboard pizza; these NB shoes are so generic and have no compelling reasons for use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy and well made as most new bal items.
customer_reviews.author: Ray V

customer_reviews.title: Won’t regret them.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my dad. He is in his early 60s and had a health scare a few years ago so he walks a lot. 40-60 min a day. He doesn’t understand the importance of retiring old shoes once they reach a certain amount of miles. These are very cushiony and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Krishna K

customer_reviews.title: A perfect shoe for walking, running, and working out
customer_reviews.text: I brought a size 13 and love how they fit. The shoes are well made and tough. When wearing them my feet feels well cushioned, comfortable, and supported.
customer_reviews.author: R. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: It seems the sizing has changed. I have always worn an 8 1/2 wide in new balance shoes and boots. These are much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I recently started working out and these are perfect. I've bought 3 pair now for my family. Comfortable and roomy. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I tried hiking on a rocky trail with these. You feel every pebble. But they’re not bad on flat ground and are fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: We’ll made comfortable and supportive. I walk not run and they fit my needs perfectly, at a fair price
customer_reviews.author: RIJIM

customer_reviews.title: better luck next time
customer_reviews.text: Actually I sent them back- , I have worn similar new balance shoes for years with no problems- but these were too small.
customer_reviews.author: M Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I only ever buy New Balance and these are a good deal and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: dhdallas

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well built shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are well-cushioned, durable shoes. Excellent fit for those with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: emily g.

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through shoes about every 4 months. I always get these for sturdiness and value.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes if you have fat feet like I do. This way you don’t have to go up a size
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Perez

customer_reviews.title: xtr wide  shoe
customer_reviews.text: it fit like it was 2 sizes smaller,,, and not a wide though it was labeled that way,,,, I have been wearing new balance for many years and I have never had one like this.... don't buy this seller... John Broadwell,, 706 265 7991
customer_reviews.author: John Broadwell

customer_reviews.title: they where all-terrain which I use
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered wide but received regular but I think I ordered the wrong size but I still can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: Two days in and so far I love it. My feet haven’t hurt since I made the switch to these!
customer_reviews.author: Peter El Hashem

customer_reviews.title: Love New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I always keep an extra pair or two of New Balance trail sneakers in the closet. It’s the only brand I have worn in the last 10 plus years. They perform great in the woods on any terrain as well as on the street. Supportive Comfortable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey r hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good value comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was as expected these shoes are comfortable and a good value. I haven’t had them long enough to comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is my go to for shoes because of the various widths they offer. Love the look and price of these ($27). Will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Wide width is great
customer_reviews.text: For a mid-60s former runner who just needs good everyday shoes. A great price. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This said womens but I received a LARGER MENS
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I ordered a womens wide and got a man super large. It was two sizes too big and did not fit at alll!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Half size
customer_reviews.text: Like Nike shoes but the fit is always smaller than other brands. Next time I'll buy half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: RVRose

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes I don't use them for the trail but for walking great
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Newer, not better
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near as much padding and support as previous purchases of the model. For box seems tighter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  L.

customer_reviews.title: All good!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new shoes! The fit was perfect size 8. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Decent sneakers, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes for a great price! They fit as other new balance sneakers. I don't know how durable they are but will update my review in future.
customer_reviews.author: Hakob

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in good shape. New Balance shoes are always well made, and are one of the few lines that allow you to pick wider shoes. I have worn them for years, and have always been satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Experienced New Balance shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like gray and pink sole of the shoe. Memory foam of the shoe brings the comfort to the foot and size of the shoe is perfect fit. Bought this shoe when it was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: DIMPLE KONERU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes for walking my daughter around in her stroller 👍
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, very very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this! Left shoes kind of broken above heel , everytime need to fix before wearing. Don’t buy this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Faheem Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Exchanged
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered the wrong size shoes. From the looks they were very comfortable and surprisingly stylish. The exchange process was very easy and prompt. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I'm psssd if you look at ad it says women's 10 but really when you pay for shoe it switched to Men's 10.5 ths shoe is waaaay too big I can't im returning
customer_reviews.author: sheerene  peterson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of NB shoes, but these seem to be a bit snugger (same sizes ordered) than previous pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes so much I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Shoes  wear quicker than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and comfort, but they are wearing out more quickly than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat New Balance shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and fair price . Recieved on time and was in good shape .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I use this shoe for running, walking and hiking - works great in all situations.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M OMAHONY

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of these shoes. My husband likesthe plain look and the good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Bayona

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Size Issue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide shoes. The ones I received were D width, which in a mens shoe isn't really wide. Sent them back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As usual new balance products have the quality I’ve come to expect.
customer_reviews.author: TRENT W HOLLAND

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are fine
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were fine but the box looked like it been through a war
customer_reviews.author: Knicknla

customer_reviews.title: These suck
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these I don't believe they are even real newbalance
customer_reviews.author: sam heath

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 510v4 Cushioning Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Built for utility, born for the trail. The Trail 510v4 sports supportive upper elements, Toe Protect, All-Terrain Tread, ABZORB cushioning and an NB Ultra Soft comfort insert to provide all-day comfort for whatever obstacles lay in your path.
